message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you at a price of $18,000. I believe it holds significant value and would be a worthwhile investment for you.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I am only able to pay up to $12,000 for the product. Thank you for considering my budget.
Bob, I understand your position, but I'm confident this product is worth more than your initial offer. How about we meet in the middle at $15,000?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am still unable to exceed $12,000. Would you consider meeting me halfway at $14,000?
